duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the overall strategic responsibility of the senior living community and maintain high care standards for residents.
Lead and manage a team of employees with effective communication and attention to detail.
Promote and uphold core values of Dignity, Collaboration, Compassion, and Transparency.
Ensure compliance with regulatory, safety, and operating procedures while maintaining fiscal responsibility.
Collaborate with regional and corporate leadership on short and long-term planning.
Oversee hiring, training, coaching, and performance management across all functional areas.
Drive resident engagement and retention through operational efficiency and effective resolution of grievances.
Provide on-site support, leadership, mentoring, and training to the team of Directors.
Collaborate with the Community Director of Marketing to support sales activities and initiatives.
Audit for state compliance and maintain licensure of resident and employment files, physical grounds, and building standards.
Exercise final decision-making capabilities, seeking guidance from Regional Director and Corporate Team as needed.
Ensure 24/7 coverage for urgent needs or emergencies and lead the team towards solutions.
Demonstrate excellent written and verbal communication skills.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Healthcare Administration or a related field (Master's preferred)
